  • bonjour@alexiswollseifen.com

I like framing problems and organizing collective solutions. I like when it makes sense, when it’s calm and when it’s honest.

I'm Alexis, a 31-year-old digital designer. I've been working in this industry for the past 8 years, for small and large companies, both in Canada and Belgium. I build spaces where everyone feels welcome and secure. Initially a creative developer, as I delved deeper into the designer's role, I quickly became fascinated by the diverse responsibilities it entails and eventually evolved into a pragmatic one. And I’m happy now.
